PERSONAL DETAILS

September, 20th 1987

      Stackoverflow:  https://stackoverflow.com/users/3753686/tomato32
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND

(2006 – 2011) Bachelor of Computer Science – Thang Long University 

Languages
English: Intermediate.
Japanese: Basic.
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Highly skilled IT professional with over seven years of professional experience including application
development, implementation, deployment, internal and customer support.

Performed role as developer.

Cooperative and able to perform within a team-oriented atmosphere

Interest and willingness in developing related job knowledge and skills.

Have a high sense of responsibility, careful, frequently provides high quality of work.
SOFTWARE

Databases: MS SQL Server, Oracle 11, MySQL.

Programming Languages: C#, ASP.Net (MVC 4+5+6), ASP .NET Core MVC, JavaScript, T-SQL, 
PL/SQL, HTML, CSS, JQuery.

Programming Tools: Visual Studio 2010, 2012, 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019.

App server / Middleware: Microsoft IIS.

Framework: .NET, Ext.Net, DevExpress, TwitterBootstrapMVC2, .NET Core.

Configuration Management tools: Visual SVN, TFS, Visual Sourcesafe, Gitlab.

Browsers: Firefox, Chrome.

OOAD/OOP: Object Oriented Analysis (OOA), Object Oriented Design (OOD), Object Oriented
Programming (OOP), Unified Modeling Language (UML).

Experience and knowledge with: Web Service, WCF, Web API, KoGrid, SPA, Angular JS,
Knockout JS, Vue JS, Bootstrap 4, Datatables.net, Dapper, EPPlus, HangFire, Solr, HTML5, CSS3 …
OPERATING SYSTEMS
1
Windows (Xp + 7 + 8 + 10).

The web app to manage Vinaphone customer type when they use free wifi from Vina. There are three
customer type in the system: Vip, Vina and others. Depend on customer type that allows using free wifi
different time. Using Api for identity Vina or not Vina customer.
